short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Jira tasks in a Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gojira is a powerful Chrome extension designed for Jira users, offering a quick and seamless way to access and manage tasks, view user profiles, and get real-time project updatesâ€”all from within the browser. With Gojira, users can streamline their workflow, access essential Jira information without switching tabs, and maintain focus on their projects. Designed with a user-friendly interface and secure authentication, Gojira simplifies task tracking and project management, making Jira integration smoother and more efficient.
